p: Mice were culled and whole lungs were collected from 2 dpi. Lungs were immediately fixed in 10% neutral-buffered formalin. After fixation, lung samples were then treated with xylene and embedded in paraffin. Five-micron tissue sections were stained with hematoxylin and eosin (HE) and sections were examined with a Leica DMI 3000B microscope.
